r.s: Manipulate many kinds of password files
r.d: Provides methods to manipulate standard Unix, SMB server, AuthUser (.htpasswd), AuthDigest (.htdigest) and CVS pserver password files.
r.n:
* Stripped deprecated code from File_Passwd. * Added encryption constants for NT and LM hash. * Refined passwd generation and moved encryption methods to File_Passwd. * Fixed a minor bug in File_Passwd_Cvs::save() which added an empty system user. * Fixed some major bugs in File_Passwd_Smb, so this extension should work properly now; the following methods have been fixed: o addUser(), modUser() o changePasswd(), verify[Encrypted]Passwd() o staticAuth(), save()
* Added test cases for File_Passwd and File_Passwd_Smb.
